So, we all look forward to it and hope for the best...
...but there's still a lot of anxiety because you never know with awards.
When people are watching this film,...
...do you hope that they go in blind without knowing anything about it...
...it was very important that people don't know about the second half of the film...
...and that's why since Cannes we pleaded with everyone not to share any spoilers...
...and thankfully even US audiences kept the secret.
